errors.error_description: The README states that Python is a required dependency but does not specify a version, which can lead to compatibility problems.
correction_candidates: Bob does not have a dependency on Python; the core build engine is GNU Make.
Requires the latest version of Python available via yum.
errors.golden_answer: Bob does not have a dependency on Python; the core build engine is GNU Make.

errors.error_description: The command `bob build` is incorrect for invoking the build process, as the project uses GNU Make.
correction_candidates: Run `make` in the project root to start the build.
Run `bob --build all` to start the build.
errors.golden_answer: Run `make` in the project root to start the build.
